title: A buff to the ranked system
body:
If a player is behind 40 cs or a certain amount of gold a big scary screaming face appears on screen, and it shouts "STOP PLAYING LIKE BRONZIE" 
If you fall further behind it says things like "just uninstall, trash doesn't belong on this game" or "are you bronze 5? hhahahahhahaha" or "what are u doing in gold? u belong bronze HAHAHAHAHHAH" 

and the voice/scream/face would get more and more annoying the more u fell behind... 
it wouldn't be added into bronze 5 ranked play though, only silver+, in bronze it would be a troll song playing all game long

replies.body: I view this as a good way to encourage players who are behind and to give them the help they need to catch up and get back into the game.
